ygData.subject: Re: Dorn and Murrissa Sandwistler
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey Guys, I don t know if anybody else has run across this problem.  But I have Amiable standing with all the shopkeepers in North Ro, except for one. Murissa
ygData.messageBody:
Hey Guys,

I don't know if anybody else has run across this problem. But I have
Amiable standing with all the shopkeepers in North Ro, except for one.
Murissa Sandwistler, or whatever her name is. I was ok with her, I think,
until after I killed Dorn the other day a couple of times. Now, Murissa
wants to kill me on sight. Has anyone else experienced this? Any way to
get back in good with Murissa? Thanks.

Grod
Paladin, 16th Level
Innoruuk
